member.name: T:Goedel.Protocol.Dechunk
member.summary: Read and buffer data chunks from a stream. This could be made a lot more efficient for longer streams but is acceptable for small ones.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Dechunk.ReadString(System.Int64,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Tead a string from the stream
member.param: Length of stream. If less than zero, HTTP chunked encoding is assumed.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Dechunk.ReadBytes(System.Int64,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Read an array of bytes from a stream. Note that the length of the byte array is limited to 2GB internally. For longer streams, some form of processing pipeline is advised.
member.param: Length of stream. If less than zero, HTTP chunked encoding is assumed.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Dechunk.ReadChunked(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Read an array of bytes from a stream. Note that the length of the byte array is limited to 2GB internally. For longer streams, some form of processing pipeline is advised.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Extensions.StatusInformation(System.Int32)
member.summary: Extension method to report the success or failure of transaction. Information return codes are integers in the range 100..199
member.returns: true if and only iff the transaction succeeded.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Extensions.StatusSuccess(System.Int32)
member.summary: Extension method to report the success or failure of transaction. Success return codes are integers in the range 200..299
member.returns: true if and only iff the transaction succeeded.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Extensions.StatusIncomplete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Extension method to report the success or failure of transaction. Success return codes are integers in the range 300..399
member.returns: true if and only iff the transaction succeeded.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Extensions.StatusClientError(System.Int32)
member.summary: Extension method to report the success or failure of transaction. Client Error return codes are integers in the range 400..499
member.returns: true if and only iff the transaction succeeded.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Extensions.StatusServerError(System.Int32)
member.summary: Extension method to report the success or failure of transaction. Server Error return codes are integers in the range 500..599
member.returns: true if and only iff the transaction succeeded.

member.name: T:Goedel.Protocol.Response
member.summary: Base class for all responses.

Base class for all response messages. Contains only the status code and status description fields. A service MAY return either the response message specified for that transaction or any parent of that message. Thus the RecryptResponse message MAY be returned in response to any request.

member.name: P:Goedel.Protocol.Response.StatusCode
member.summary: Numeric status return code value

member.name: P:Goedel.Protocol.Response.StatusDescriptionCode
member.summary: Description of the status code (for debugging).

member.name: P:Goedel.Protocol.Response.Status
member.summary: Status return code. The SMTP/HTTP scheme of 2xx = Success, 3xx = incomplete, 4xx = failure is followed.

member.name: P:Goedel.Protocol.Response.StatusDescription
member.summary: Text description of the status return code for debugging and log file use.

member.name: P:Goedel.Protocol.Response._Tag
